::Firearm::

Firearm smiles at Battera. "I'm fine," he says, stopping near a door, "The 
bridge is this way. Rex won't get mad if he knows what's good for him," 
Firearm's smile turns into a grin as he waves his arm cannon dangeroustly. He 
presses a button on the panel near the door, the door opening to reveal the 
advanced devices on the bridge.

"Here we are," he says, leading Battera into the bridge.
